author: smuzaffar
body:
Due to PGO changes ( e.g. using relative source path instead of full path ) broke scram code-checks rule. So it has not been run properly on PR. code-format was working but only `code-checks i..e clang-tidy` did not work as it required correct `compiler_command.json` with correct source file paths.

Updated clang-tidy unit test now makes sure
- `scram build code-checks` and `scram build code-checks-all` rules work correctly
- `scram build code-format-all` also works

This will require also cmsdist update with correct code-checks rule
title: Update clang-tidy test
